{"id":582432524,"question_id":344,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 3 months","timestamp":1636108924,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/582432524/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse String","memory":"23.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic: // access specifiers\n    \n    void reverseRec(vector<char>& s, int i, int j){\n        if ( i>= j){\n            return;\n        }\n        char temp = s[i];\n        s[i] = s[j];\n        s[j] = temp;\n        reverseRec(s, ++i, --j);\n    }\n    void reverseString(vector<char>& s) {\n          int i = 0;\n          int j = s.size() - 1;\n          reverseRec(s, i, j );  \n    }\n};\n\n/*\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    void reverseRec(vector<char>& s, int i, int j){\n        if i >= j:\n        return;\n        // swap i and jth value\n    }\n    void reverseString(vector<char>& s) {\n          int i = 0;\n          int j = s.size() - 1;\n          reverseRec(s, i, j );\n    }\n            \n            \n        }\n*/\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
